rubric.p: Put the story summary in order.

ordering.item: Neuron wanted to destroy the city of Washington.
The President called Brent to ask him for help.
Brent changed into his secret identity – Master Mind.
The President agreed to meet Neuron.
At the meeting, Neuron took off his glasses for a photo.
Master Mind saw Neuron’s eyes in a mirror.
Master Mind changed Neuron into a good person by controlling his mind.
